oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Weighted resistor current digital-to-analog converters
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RATHORE, TS
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cdac
digital-to-analog current converter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A family of weighted-resistor digital-to-analog converters (DACs) which give current as the analog output is proposed. The design proposed yields a DAC which has the minimum possible spread and the reduced total resistance. The DACs are suitable for high rate of conversion and also for economical fabrication.
